description: Light and crispy buffalo cauliflower bites will become your favourite way to snack on veggies.
keywords: Fried vegetable,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Cauliflower,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Buffalo Cauliflower Bites Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 tsp onion powder, pitted and chopped
0.5 tsp cracked black pepper, peeled, grated

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 200°C/180°C fan-forced and lightly grease a large baking tray.

Place all of the spices and seasonings in a large bowl, add 2 tablespoons of oil and then toss in the cauliflower, mixing well to coat all the florets. Arrange the florets in a single layer on the baking tray and bake for 15 minutes.
Whisk the hot sauce and remaining oil together, remove the cauliflower from the oven and pour over, tossing to coat. Bake for 10 minutes more and serve.
